org.apache.giraph.benchmark

类 BenchmarkOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.benchmark.BenchmarkOption

  • public class BenchmarkOption
extends Object
    Command line options for benchmarks

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BenchmarkOption

        public BenchmarkOption(String shortOption,
               String longOption,
               boolean hasArgument,
               String description)
        Constructor for option which is not required
        参数:
        shortOption - Short option
        longOption - Long option
        hasArgument - True iff option requires argument
        description - Description of the option

      • BenchmarkOption

        public BenchmarkOption(String shortOption,
               String longOption,
               boolean hasArgument,
               String description,
               String missingMessage)
        Constructor for option which is not required
        参数:
        shortOption - Short option
        longOption - Long option
        hasArgument - True iff option requires argument
        description - Description of the option
        missingMessage - Message to print if the option is missing

    • 方法详细资料

      • isRequired

        public boolean isRequired()
        Check if the option is required
        返回:
        True iff the option is required

      • addToOptions

        public void addToOptions(org.apache.commons.cli.Options options)
        Add option to cli Options
        参数:
        options - Cli Options

      • checkOption

        public boolean checkOption(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd,
                  org.apache.log4j.Logger log)
        If option is not required just return true. If option is required, check if it's present in CommandLine, and if it's not print the missingMessage to log.
        参数:
        cmd - CommandLine
        log - Logger to print the missing message to
        返回:
        False iff the option is required but is not specified in cmd

      • optionTurnedOn

        public boolean optionTurnedOn(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd)
        Check if the option is present in CommandLine
        参数:
        cmd - CommandLine
        返回:
        True iff the option is present in CommandLine

      • getOptionValue

        public String getOptionValue(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd)
        Retrieve the argument, if any, of this option
        参数:
        cmd - CommandLine
        返回:
        Value of the argument if option is set and has an argument, otherwise null

      • getOptionIntValue

        public int getOptionIntValue(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd)
        Retrieve the argument of this option as integer value

        返回:
        Value of the argument as integer value

      • getOptionIntValue

        public int getOptionIntValue(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd,
                    int defaultValue)
        Retrieve the argument of this option as integer value, or default value if option is not set
        参数:
        cmd - CommandLine
        defaultValue - Default value
        返回:
        Value of the argument as integer value, or default value if option is not set
